mapper.select: SELECT che.`carnumber`,pinpai.`brandname`,chexing.`motorcyclename`,che.`drivername`,che.`driverphone`,che.`driverbrithday`,fadongji.`motorletter`,fadongji.`motorname` FROM `consumercar` AS che,`carbrand` AS pinpai,`motorbrand` AS fadongji,`motorcycle` AS chexing WHERE che.`motorcycleid`=chexing.`motorcycleid` AND chexing.`brandid`=pinpai.`brandid` AND chexing.`motorid`=fadongji.`motorid` AND che.`userid`=#{userid}
